attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Roy Hodgson, current manager of Fulham, deserves a knighthood for services to football. He has managed twelve clubs and three nations, and has been respected and admired everywhere that he has managed. Hodgson is now 61 and his lifetime contribution to football is rivaled by few.

rejection.details:
The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/

Kind Regards

E-Petitions Team
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
